marytts.signalproc.analysis.distance
Class RmsLsfDistortionComputer

java.lang.Object
  marytts.signalproc.analysis.distance.BaselineDistortionComputer
      marytts.signalproc.analysis.distance.RmsLsfDistortionComputer

public class RmsLsfDistortionComputer
extends BaselineDistortionComputer

Implements root-mean-square line spectral frequency vector distance given two sets of paired files

Author:
Oytun Türk
